commit.message:
re PR rtl-optimization/50615 (ICE: in distribute_notes, at combine.c:13282 with -O --param max-cse-insns=1)

	PR rtl-optimization/50615
	* combine.c (distribute_notes) <REG_ARGS_SIZE>: Skip if I3 is a no-op.

From-SVN: r180058
